languages.text: {n}Этот голос, прорвавшийся сквозь марево на одно мгновение... В этом голосе — излом, которого когда-то пытались добиться {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}ваши пыточники{/d}. Мучителям того, чье сознание скрыто в этом исчадии, удалось изуродовать свою жертву — но не уничтожить до конца. И почему же этот голос показался вам таким знакомым?..{/n}

{n}That voice, the one that cut through the haze for just a moment... It is the voice of a break. The same break that {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}your tormentors{/d} once tried to achieve. The ones who tortured the mind that dwells in this abominable spawn succeeded in maiming their victim — yet they could not destroy them completely. But why did that voice sound so familiar to you?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Этот голос, прорвавшийся сквозь марево на одно мгновение... В этом голосе — излом, которого когда-то пытались добиться {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}ваши пыточники{/d}. Мучителям того, чье сознание скрыто в этом исчадии, удалось изуродовать свою жертву — но не уничтожить до конца. И почему же этот голос показался вам таким знакомым?..{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}That voice, the one that cut through the haze for just a moment... It is the voice of a break. The same break that your tormentors once tried to achieve. The ones who tortured the mind that dwells in this abominable spawn succeeded in maiming their victim — yet they could not destroy them completely. But why did that voice sound so familiar to you?{/n}

languages.text: {n}那个声音，那个仿佛从迷雾之中渗透出来的声音……那是心灵破碎的声音，那些曾经{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}折磨你的人{/d}，就想把你变成这个样子。而现在，眼前这个受害者遭到了更加可怕的折磨，灵魂遭到了残损，但并没有被彻底摧毁。不过，这个痛苦的声音为什么听起来这么耳熟呢？{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}That voice, the one that cut through the haze for just a moment... It is the voice of a break. The same break that {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}your tormentors{/d} once tried to achieve. The ones who tortured the mind that dwells in this abominable spawn succeeded in maiming their victim — yet they could not destroy them completely. But why did that voice sound so familiar to you?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}那个声音，那个仿佛从迷雾之中渗透出来的声音……那是心灵破碎的声音，那些曾经折磨你的人，就想把你变成这个样子。而现在，眼前这个受害者遭到了更加可怕的折磨，灵魂遭到了残损，但并没有被彻底摧毁。不过，这个痛苦的声音为什么听起来这么耳熟呢？{/n}

languages.text: {n}Diese Stimme, die Stimme, die nur einen kurzen Augenblick lang den Nebel durchschnitten hat ... Das ist die Stimme einer Pause. Derselben Pause, die {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}deine Peiniger{/d} einst zu erwirken versucht haben. Die Folterer, die den Verstand dieser widerwärtigen Brut gequält haben, haben ihr Opfer zwar verstümmelt ... aber sie konnten es nicht vollständig vernichten. Aber warum kam dir diese Stimme so vertraut vor?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}That voice, the one that cut through the haze for just a moment... It is the voice of a break. The same break that {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}your tormentors{/d} once tried to achieve. The ones who tortured the mind that dwells in this abominable spawn succeeded in maiming their victim — yet they could not destroy them completely. But why did that voice sound so familiar to you?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Diese Stimme, die Stimme, die nur einen kurzen Augenblick lang den Nebel durchschnitten hat ... Das ist die Stimme einer Pause. Derselben Pause, die deine Peiniger einst zu erwirken versucht haben. Die Folterer, die den Verstand dieser widerwärtigen Brut gequält haben, haben ihr Opfer zwar verstümmelt ... aber sie konnten es nicht vollständig vernichten. Aber warum kam dir diese Stimme so vertraut vor?{/n}

languages.text: {n}Cette voix, celle qui a transpercé la brume un bref instant... c'est celle d'une fracture, cette même fracture que {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}vos tortionnaires{/d} ont essayé de provoquer. Ceux qui ont torturé l'esprit qui sommeille dans cette créature abominable ont réussi à mutiler leur victime, sans pour autant parvenir à la détruire complètement. Mais pourquoi cette voix vous était-elle si familière ?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}That voice, the one that cut through the haze for just a moment... It is the voice of a break. The same break that {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}your tormentors{/d} once tried to achieve. The ones who tortured the mind that dwells in this abominable spawn succeeded in maiming their victim — yet they could not destroy them completely. But why did that voice sound so familiar to you?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cette voix, celle qui a transpercé la brume un bref instant... c'est celle d'une fracture, cette même fracture que vos tortionnaires ont essayé de provoquer. Ceux qui ont torturé l'esprit qui sommeille dans cette créature abominable ont réussi à mutiler leur victime, sans pour autant parvenir à la détruire complètement. Mais pourquoi cette voix vous était-elle si familière ?{/n}

languages.text: {n}La voz, la que ha atravesado la neblina por un momento... es la voz de una ruptura. La misma ruptura que intentaban causar {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}tus torturadores{/d}. Quienes han torturado la mente que habita en este abominable engendro han logrado mutilar a su víctima... pero no destruirla por completo. Pero ¿por qué te resulta tan familiar la voz?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}That voice, the one that cut through the haze for just a moment... It is the voice of a break. The same break that {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}your tormentors{/d} once tried to achieve. The ones who tortured the mind that dwells in this abominable spawn succeeded in maiming their victim — yet they could not destroy them completely. But why did that voice sound so familiar to you?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La voz, la que ha atravesado la neblina por un momento... es la voz de una ruptura. La misma ruptura que intentaban causar tus torturadores. Quienes han torturado la mente que habita en este abominable engendro han logrado mutilar a su víctima... pero no destruirla por completo. Pero ¿por qué te resulta tan familiar la voz?{/n}

languages.text: {n}その声、ほんの一瞬だけモヤを切り裂いた声は…心の折れる声だった。かつて{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}トーメンター{/d}が求めたそれである。あの忌まわしい落とし子に宿る精神を拷問した者たちは、犠牲者を傷つけることには成功したが、完全に壊してしまうことはできなかった。だがあの声に聞き覚えがあったのはなぜだろうか？{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}That voice, the one that cut through the haze for just a moment... It is the voice of a break. The same break that {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}your tormentors{/d} once tried to achieve. The ones who tortured the mind that dwells in this abominable spawn succeeded in maiming their victim — yet they could not destroy them completely. But why did that voice sound so familiar to you?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}その声、ほんの一瞬だけモヤを切り裂いた声は…心の折れる声だった。かつて{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}トーメンター{/d}が求めたそれである。あの忌まわしい落とし子に宿る精神を拷問した者たちは、犠牲者を傷つけることには成功したが、完全に壊してしまうことはできなかった。だがあの声に聞き覚えがあったのはなぜだろうか？{/n}

languages.text: {n}O ses, bir anlığına bile olsa tüm o pus tabakasını dağıtan o ses... Bu, bir kırılmanın sesi. {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}İşkencecilerinin{/d} bir vakitler ulaşmaya çalıştığı o kırılma... Bu menfur yaratığın zihnine işkence edenler, kurbanlarını sakatlamayı başarmış ama... Yine de onu tamamen yok edememişler. İyi de o ses, kulağına neden bu kadar aşina geliyor?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}That voice, the one that cut through the haze for just a moment... It is the voice of a break. The same break that {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}your tormentors{/d} once tried to achieve. The ones who tortured the mind that dwells in this abominable spawn succeeded in maiming their victim — yet they could not destroy them completely. But why did that voice sound so familiar to you?{/n}

Bu, bir kırılmanın sesi. {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}İşkencecilerinin{/d} bir vakitler ulaşmaya çalıştığı o kırılma... Bu menfur yaratığın zihnine işkence edenler, kurbanlarını sakatlamayı başarmışlar ama... Yine de onu tamamen yok edememişler. İyi de o ses, kulağına neden bu kadar aşina geliyor?{/n}
